long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlueScreen: Clean up your Twitter experience

- Remove artificially boosted Twitter Blue Tweets from your Timeline and/or replies
- Hide annoying "Subscribe to Premium" ads from your sidebars and feed
